dublinCore.dc:title: 110 HR 3415 IH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Langevin (for himself, Ms. Berkley, Mr. Butterfield, Mr. Kildee, and Mr. Kennedy) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the placement in a national cemetery of memorial markers for the purpose of commemorating servicemembers or other persons whose remains are interred in an American Battle Monuments Commission cemetery.

section.header: Treatment of internment of remains in American Battle Monuments Commission cemetery as unavailable for purposes of placement of memorial markers in national cemeteries
section.text: Paragraph (3) of section 2306(b) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking or at the end of subparagraph (C);
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: are interred in an American Battle Monuments Commission cemetery.
